comments:
Description:
Report preview all failed after deploy BIRT in application server(e.g.Tomcat)

Steps to reproduce:
1. Deploy birt in tomcat, view sample report

Result:
root cause

The icu4j jars is not accessible. They need to be put under birt/web-inf/lib folder.
Need to modify [Export] target in BuildWebViewer.xml to put icu4j jar into corresponding folder.
Can you help me do that?
Modify build script of viewer plug-in to put icu4j jar into birt/web-inf/lib folder.
